scripts.reinstall: docker run --rm --interactive --tty --network=host -v "$PWD:$PWD" -w "$PWD" -u "1000" node:16-alpine npx pnpm@6 install
scripts.clean:generated: rm -rf dist ee/*/dist ee/*/temp packages/*/dist packages/*/temp
scripts.pw:build: cd packages/admin && docker-compose run --rm playwright-tests npm run -- pw:build
scripts.pw:preview: cd packages/admin && docker-compose run --rm playwright-tests npm run -- pw:preview
scripts.pw:update-only: cd packages/admin && docker-compose run --rm playwright-tests npm run -- pw:update
scripts.pw:test-only: cd packages/admin && docker-compose run --rm playwright-tests npm run -- pw:test
scripts.pw:debug-only: cd packages/admin && docker-compose run --rm playwright-tests npm run -- pw:debug
scripts.start: docker-compose up --detach && yarn contember migrations:execute . --yes & yarn start:sandbox
scripts.ae:update: yarn clean:generated && yarn ts:build && yarn ae:build
